Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal pitched 8 innings, allowing 1 run on 4 hits, with 8 strikeouts and no walks.
Tyler O'Neill hit a 401-foot home run in the first inning.
Poor defense by the Red Sox allowed the Tigers to take the lead against Nick Pivetta in the second inning.
Pre-Game Insights: Red Sox manager Alex Cora praised Tarik Skubal, saying he's probably the best pitcher in the American League.
Post-Match Reflections: Red Sox manager Alex Cora said the team needs to play better baseball, but believes they can do more.
Tyler O'Neill said the team has lots of baseball going forward and needs to make a sustained run of success soon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game finished in 2 hours and 1 minute.
The Red Sox remain 3Â½ games out in the race for a wild-card berth.
With Minnesota losing, the Sox had a chance to gain ground in the standings.
